class.name: EditorExportPreset
class.description: Export preset configuration. Instances of [EditorExportPreset] by editor UI and intended to be used a read-only configuration passed to the [EditorExportPlatform] methods when exporting the project.

method.name: are_advanced_options_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], is "Advanced" toggle is enabled in the export dialog.

method.name: get_custom_features
method.description: Returns string with a comma separated list of custom features.

method.name: get_customized_files
method.description: Returns [Dictionary] of files selected in the "Resources" tab of the export dialog. Dictionary keys are file names and values are export mode - [code]"strip[/code], [code]"keep"[/code], or [code]"remove"[/code]. See also [method get_file_export_mode].

method.name: get_customized_files_count
method.description: Returns number of files selected in the "Resources" tab of the export dialog.

method.name: get_encrypt_directory
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], PCK directory encryption is enabled in the export dialog.

method.name: get_encrypt_pck
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], PCK encryption is enabled in the export dialog.

method.name: get_encryption_ex_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to exclude during PCK encryption.

method.name: get_encryption_in_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to include during PCK encryption.

method.name: get_encryption_key
method.description: Returns PCK encryption key.

method.name: get_exclude_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to exclude during export.

method.name: get_export_filter
method.description: Returns export file filter mode selected in the "Resources" tab of the export dialog.

method.name: get_export_path
method.description: Returns export target path.

method.name: get_file_export_mode
method.description: Returns file export mode for the specified file.

method.name: get_files_to_export
method.description: Returns array of files to export.

method.name: get_include_filter
method.description: Returns file filters to include during export.

method.name: get_or_env
method.description: Returns export option value or value of environment variable if it is set.

method.name: get_preset_name
method.description: Returns export preset name.

method.name: get_script_export_mode
method.description: Returns script export mode.

method.name: get_version
method.description: Returns the preset's version number, or fall back to the [member ProjectSettings.application/config/version] project setting if set to an empty string. If [param windows_version] is [code]true[/code], formats the returned version number to be compatible with Windows executable metadata.

method.name: has
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if preset has specified property.

method.name: has_export_file
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if specified file is exported.

method.name: is_dedicated_server
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if dedicated server export mode is selected in the export dialog.

method.name: is_runnable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if "Runnable" toggle is enabled in the export dialog.
